parameters: Greetings travellers. Welcome to the Lunar
Shrine, home to many of the deities worshipped
throughout the kingdom. I am High Priest
Selvaris, and I preside over this temple.
Thank you Selvaris. We are here on an urgent
The king? It's been quite some time since the
king sent anyone here. What exactly is it
We've been sent to retrieve an artifact that
is understood to be kept here.
So best to just stay out of our way, and let
us get on with it Selvaris!
Odan..? It's been quite some time.
The less said about it the better, Elim.
To business then Selvaris - may we take some
As you wish, but I fear you will not find much
here. Try not to break anything Odan, heh...
I've got no qualms about shedding blood on
holy ground Selvaris. Cease your taunting, or
Odan! It's not worth it. Lets talk about it
